guide: For this you will need Combat 15.
To blow up crypts you can use
class abilities (Tank, Archer, Mage)
and/or Superboom TNTs that drop
from slaying Minibosses in dungeons
and can be bought from Walther in
The Deep Caverns or Ophelia in
The Dungeon Hub.
Kill Team Treasurite members in the Crystal Hollows.
They spawn in the Mithril Deposits and you will need
Heart of the Mountain 4 to go there.
Recommended for this is to fish in the
Backwater Bayou with the best rod you have
access to and full Angler Set or better.
You can also donate any special fish that you
get to Coral in Galatea (requires 1.21.5)
Kill Endermen in The End using full Ender Armor
and a Void Sword or Dreadlord Sword.

note: Gain coins from the Scavenger Enchant
guide: Apply/Use the highest tier of Scavenger
that you can get your hands on and put it
on your main weapon. Gifts from the Jerry Island
can be a way to obtain Scavenger IV books.
You can also use the weapon drops from dungeon mobs
as those have guaranteed Scavenger 5.
You can buy this for a total of 400 coins
from the Fishing Merchant in the Hub.
Kill farm animals in the Barn with a Cleaver
with Cleave 5 and Sharpness 5
or spiders in Arachne's Burrow
in the Spider's Den with a Dreadlord Sword.
You can also kill Endermen in The End to
get progress towards the
Enderman Slayer Community Goal.
For this you'll want to open structure chests
in the Crystal Hollows, do a Nucleus Run
(you will need a Small Gemstone Sack for this to count)
or kill Worms/Scathas.
Talk to the Blacksmith in the Hub
and gamble Reforges on an armor piece
until you get the Titanic Reforge.
You might need to bring some money for this.
This unlocks at 5k Diamond Collection. Use Pure Ores
in the Dwarven Mines for this. Craft it with
1 Enchanted Diamond and 8 Vines (costs 40 Jungle Leaves,
requires Jungle Wood Collection 4 to unlock it in /trades.)
You'll unlock this recipe passively
(2.5k leather collection)
if you chose to do Exterminator in Barn.
Craft it with 592 Leather.
You can also use Cow Minions for this.
Do your daily Experimentation Tables
after getting Enchanting Level 10.
Mine Pure Emeralds in the Dwarven Mines
with a Fortune 3+ pickaxe.
You might want to use as many minions
as you have access to for this.
Remember to put a compactor in the minions
when you plan on leaving for a while.
Don't forget to fuel the minions,
give them storages and collect them in time.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress once you
talked to Bramass Beastslayer in The Spiders Den.
For this you may want to participate
in Mining Events in the Dwarven Mines
as you have a 20% chance to obtain
an Ultimate Enchanted Book from this.
You can also open Dungeon Reward Chests
for this. For that way you may require coins.
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold and Diamond Armor.
Recommended for this are:
Bingo, Rock and Grandma Wolf.
Talk to Guildford in the Dungeon Hub
and complete 4/4 objectives for 3 races.
Don't forget to talk to Guildford
after each run you do.
Start an Entrance floor and play Mage/Tank/Berserker to use
the classes abilities to kill a Lost Adventurer.
You only need to get the last hit
on it to count, so you can get help from your team.
You need Combat Level 15 to join a Dungeon.
For this you can farm some crops
in the Hub or do a bit of farming
in The Garden (needs SB Level 12).
Craft some easy minions while also getting
those that will help with this Bingo.
(meaning Cow, Gold, Emerald and maybe
Fishing Minion if you want to go for
Community Goals later)
Mine Pure Gold in the Dwarven Mines
or Gold Blocks in the Mines of Divan
(found in the Crystal Hollows,
needs HOTM 4 to enter)
with a Fortune 3+ pickaxe.
You might want to use as many minions
as you have access to for this.
Remember to put a compactor in the minions
when you plan on leaving for a while.
Don't forget to fuel the minions,
give them storages and collect them in time.
You can find Relic Coordinates in Skytils or the Wiki.
You will need Ender Pearls to reach some of them.
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on xMeru's, skyerzz's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
